name: debrief
description: Object serialization and annotation, for use in human-friendly error messages

scripts.build: yarn run build:clean && yarn run build:lib && yarn run build:flow
scripts.check: yarn run check:eslint && yarn run check:prettier && yarn run check:import-sort
scripts.fix: yarn run fix:prettier && yarn run fix:import-sort
scripts.actually-prepublish: yarn run build:clean && yarn run test && yarn run build
scripts.test: yarn run test:flow && yarn run test:jest && yarn run check
